FuncDef: This command enables the ATM VP shaper under the ATM port. The type of ATM shaper are CBR or rt/nrt-VBR as defined by the traffic descriptor. It cannot be a UBR service-type.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the VP identifier. Values-0 to 4095.
Specifies the ATM traffic description ID. Values-1 to 1000.
